problem: If x + y = 10 and xy = 21, what is the value of x² + y²?
A train travels 120 miles in 2 hours, then slows down and travels 90 miles in 3 hours. What is the average speed for the whole trip in miles per hour?
Sarah has 24 apples. She gives away 1/3 of them to friends and eats 2 more. How many apples does she have left?

If the probability of rain on Saturday is 0.3 and the probability of rain on Sunday is 0.4, what is the probability that it will rain on at least one of these days? (Assume the events are independent)
A rectangular floor measures 12 feet by 15 feet. If tiles measuring 8 inches by 8 inches are used to cover the floor, how many tiles will be needed?
If 3x - 5y = 7 and 2x + 4y = 16, what is the value of x?
A store sells notebooks at $2.50 each. If you buy 3 or more notebooks, the price of each notebook is reduced by 20%. How much will you pay for 5 notebooks?
The average (arithmetic mean) of five consecutive integers is 27. What is the largest of these integers?
A solution contains 25% alcohol by volume. If 20 ml of water is added to 100 ml of this solution, what is the percentage of alcohol in the new solution?
If log₄(x) = 3/2, what is the value of x?
